think_procedure: 1. Identify the purpose of the knob 'log_min_duration_statement'. 2. Understand that this knob controls the minimum execution time of statements that are logged. 3. Check if there are special values associated with it. 4. Determine if setting it to a special value (like -1 or 0) changes its behavior significantly. 5. Realize that setting it to -1 disables logging, while setting it to 0 logs all statements. 6. Conclude that it has special values that alter its regular functionality.
